column4: how can i combine two boot disk ISOs? i want to combine a sisela boot disk with a super grub disk[to save CDs] command line is easier for me[though if i need programs i can do that /sigh]
noone knows how to combine bootable ISO disks?
you could burn both to one cd and make your own bootloader script to load one or hte other, but you would need to know where on the disk the second bootscript is
any how-tos on that?[@bazhang i know it's do-able cause i saw someone do this with ubuntu, kubuntu, xubuntu cds and the alt installers on a dvd once]
